prompt: Seamless tileable parchment board surface texture; neutral warm beige; subtle paper fibers and very light grain; even distribution with no focal point; flat diffuse lighting.
constraints: perfectly tileable in both directions; no grid lines; no borders; no symbols; no vignette; no stains; no text

prompt: Seamless tileable ink line texture on transparent background; monochrome black ink grain and slight bleed texture intended to be multiplied over procedural lines; evenly distributed; no explicit grid pattern.
constraints: perfectly tileable in both directions; transparent background; no symbols; no text

prompt: Horizontal chevron border strip, flat vector-like graphic; single-color dark ink on transparent background; clean repeating chevrons; no texture; no lighting; no perspective; keep pattern centered vertically with padding above and below.
constraints: tileable left-to-right; transparent background; no text; no symbols other than chevrons

prompt: Simple geometric corner ornament; vector-like flat ink; neutral symmetrical corner stamp; transparent background; minimal detail; crisp edges.
constraints: transparent background; no text; no mythological motifs; no borders

prompt: Monochrome black glyph on transparent background: concentric circle (thin ring with a small solid dot at center); vector-like; crisp edges; centered.
constraints: transparent background; monochrome black; no text

prompt: Monochrome black glyph on transparent background: double vertical bars (two parallel thin rectangles); vector-like; crisp edges; centered.
constraints: transparent background; monochrome black; no text

prompt: Monochrome black glyph on transparent background: diamond outline with a small solid dot at center; vector-like; crisp edges; centered.
constraints: transparent background; monochrome black; no text

prompt: Monochrome black glyph on transparent background: three horizontal wavy lines; vector-like; crisp edges; centered.
constraints: transparent background; monochrome black; no text

prompt: Monochrome black glyph on transparent background: simple triangle outline; vector-like; crisp edges; centered.
constraints: transparent background; monochrome black; no text

prompt: Round player token, top-down view; warm neutral wood tone; subtle, soft shading; no harsh highlights; clean edge; transparent background.
constraints: transparent background; no text; no logos; shading must be subtle and neutral

prompt: Round player token, top-down view; cool neutral stone or ceramic tone; subtle, soft shading; no harsh highlights; clean edge; transparent background.
constraints: transparent background; no text; no logos; shading must be subtle and neutral

constraints: transparent background; no text; no symbols

prompt: Capture/swap flash overlay on transparent background; subtle radial burst with soft edges; minimal and neutral; centered.
constraints: transparent background; no text; no symbols

Very subtle vignette overlay on transparent background; gentle darkening toward edges, clear center; neutral tone; no texture.
